text: Mark Hamill's pretty sick of fending off rumours about his death. And he's found a brilliant new way to take the piss out of it all – by mourning himself. The Star Wars legend, who plays Luke Skywalker in the franchise, responded to a Twitter report of his death by writing his own feelings about it. © Disney Lucas Film Advertisement - Continue Reading Below He jokingly commented on the report : ` ` MUCH OF NATION MOURNS - RIP @ HamillHimself a wonderful - underrated & beloved icon - Truly a legend in his own mind # SoGladIGotToMeetHim # KindaSad''.
